PARAMETERS_LATEX: P_{{i}}: \text{{price}}, C_{{i}}: \text{{cost}}, Q_{{i}}: \text{{quota}}, A_{{i}}: \text{{activation cost}}, M_{{i}}: \text{{min batch}}, D_{{i}}: \text{{min production days}}, T_{{i}}: \text{{total production limit}}, L_{{i}}: \text{{min production line activation minutes}}, R: \text{{revenue}}
CONSTRAINTS_LATEX: x_{{i}} \leq P_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; \sum_{{i \in I}} x_{{i}} \leq T_{{i}}; x_{{i}} \geq M_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \leq Q_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \geq D_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \geq 0, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \leq A_{{i}} x_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \leq R_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; \sum_{{i \in I}} x_{{i}} \leq 1210; x_{{i}} \geq 22 x_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \geq 57 x_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \leq 500 x_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \leq 450 x_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \leq 550 x_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \geq 20 x_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \geq 20 x_{{i}}, \forall i \in I; x_{{i}} \geq 16 x_{{i}}, \forall i \in I
